resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit My Aggie?
Are you sure you want to logout?
Are you sure you want to cancel?

Welcome to My Aggie! Your personal farm organizer. 


 Visit the My Farm feature to start adding details about the land in your farm!
 ■ Create plots to distinguish between different fields or sections of land 
■ Record soil type, pH and more for each plot 
■ Coming soon you can link crops, livestock and resources to the different plots 

 Arriving later this month is the Activity Feature! 

 With the Activity feature you can:
 ■ Record when you last harvested your crops 
■ Track the treatments provided to your crops 
■ Record the trims you gave your livestock 
■ Connect your activities to the different Plots created in My Farm 
■ And more! 

 Future features include:
 ■ Ask an Aggie - get professional opinions and an advice from Agricultural Experts 
■ Marketplace - buy and sell your products through our service 
■ Reporting - automatic insight into finances, growth and more 
■ AI Powered Farm Blue Printing, Produce Grading and Pest Identification 

 We hope you love the app and if you have any questions, or comments please send us a message through the contact us form in the left menu!

Welcome to My Aggie! Your personal farm organizer.
Visit the My Farm feature to start adding details about the land in your farm!
Create plots to distinguish between different fields or sections of land
Record soil type, pH and more for each plot
Coming soon you can link crops, livestock and resources to the different plots
Arriving later this month is the Activity Feature!
With the Activity feature you can:
Record when you last harvested your crops
Track the treatments provided to your crops
Record the trims you gave your livestock
Connect your activities to the different Plots created in My Farm
And more!
Future features include:
Ask an Aggie - get professional opinions and an advice from Agricultural Experts
Marketplace - buy and sell your products through our service
Reporting - automatic insight into finances, growth and more
AI Powered Farm Blue Printing, Produce Grading and Pest Identification
We hope you love the app and if you have any questions, or comments please send us a message through the contact us form in the left menu!
